allow:
Bash(kill-port.bat << 'EOF'
@echo off
for /f "tokens=5" %%a in \('netstat -ano ^| findstr :3001'\) do taskkill /PID %%a /F
timeout /t 2
EOF)

Bash(/tmp/sync-docker-internal.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
docker exec nfc-postgres psql -U nfc -d nfc_admin << 'EOSQL'
-- Deletar posts das arenas
DELETE FROM "Post" WHERE "arenaId" IN \(
  SELECT id FROM "Arena" WHERE slug IN \('protocolo-lipedema', 'sinal-vermelho'\)
\);

-- Verificar resultado
SELECT COUNT\(*\), 'Posts deletados' as status FROM "Post" WHERE "arenaId" IN \(
  SELECT id FROM "Arena" WHERE slug IN \('protocolo-lipedema', 'sinal-vermelho'\)
\);
EOSQL
EOF)

Bash(/tmp/setup-docker-db.sql << 'EOF'
-- Criar extens√µes
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "uuid-ossp";
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS "pgcrypto";

-- Tabela Arena
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Arena" \(
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4\(\),
  name VARCHAR\(255\) NOT NULL,
  slug VARCHAR\(255\) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  icon VARCHAR\(50\),
  color VARCHAR\(255\),
  category VARCHAR\(100\),
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  isPaused BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  allowImages BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  allowLinks BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  allowVideos BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  aiPersona VARCHAR\(50\) DEFAULT 'BALANCED',
  aiInterventionRate INT DEFAULT 50,
  aiFrustrationThreshold INT DEFAULT 120,
  aiCooldown INT DEFAULT 5,
  arenaType VARCHAR\(50\) DEFAULT 'GENERAL',
  parentArenaSlug VARCHAR\(255\),
  requiresFP INT,
  requiresSubscription BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  movementCategory VARCHAR\(100\),
  movementPattern VARCHAR\(100\),
  categoria VARCHAR\(100\),
  criadaPor VARCHAR\(50\),
  createdByUserId UUID,
  totalPosts INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalComments INT DEFAULT 0,
  dailyActiveUsers INT DEFAULT 0,
  status VARCHAR\(50\) DEFAULT 'COLD',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
\);

-- Tabela User
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "User" \(
  id VARCHAR\(255\) PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR\(255\) UNIQUE,
  name VARCHAR\(255\),
  role VARCHAR\(50\) DEFAULT 'USER',
  is_ghost_user BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  fpTotal INT DEFAULT 0,
  fpAvailable INT DEFAULT 0,
  currentStreak INT DEFAULT 0,
  longestStreak INT DEFAULT 0,
  isMuted BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  isBanned BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  spamScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
\);

-- Tabela Post
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Post" \(
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4\(\),
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  "arenaId" UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES "Arena"\(id\) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  "userId" VARCHAR\(255\) NOT NULL REFERENCES "User"\(id\),
  "isAIResponse" BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
  "isPublished" BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  "isApproved" BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  "createdAt" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  "updatedAt" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
\);

-- √çndices
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_post_arena ON "Post"\("arenaId"\);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_post_user ON "Post"\("userId"\);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_arena_slug ON "Arena"\(slug\);

EOF)
Bash(wmic process where "commandline like ''%next%''" get processid,commandline)
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-Process cloudflared -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, Name, CPU, StartTime")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Stop-Process -Id 96380 -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Start-Sleep 2; Get-Process cloudflared -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, StartTime")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Start-Sleep 5; Get-Process cloudflared -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Id, CPU, StartTime | Sort-Object StartTime")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-WmiObject Win32_Service -Filter ''Name=""Cloudflared""'' | Select-Object Name, State, ProcessId")
